metadata.title: CVE-2017-17919 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** SQL injection vulnerability in the 'order' method in Ruby onRails 5.1.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQLcommands via the 'id desc' parameter. NOTE: The vendor disputes this issuebecause the documentation states that this method is not intended for usewith untrusted input.

criterions.comment: rails package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
